Class User

java.lang.Object
com.builderportfolio.model.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the Builder Portfolio Management System. A user can either be a Builder or a Project Manager based on role. Each user is assigned a unique ID automatically during registration.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userName, String userEmail, String userPhoneNo, int userExperience, String password, int selectedRole)
      Creates a new user during registration. Automatically assigns a unique ID based on the selected role.
      Parameters:
      userName - Name of the user (cannot be null or empty)
      userEmail - Email of the user (cannot be null or empty)
      userPhoneNo - Phone number of the user
      userExperience - Experience in years
      password - Account password (cannot be null or empty)
      selectedRole - Role of user (1 = Builder, 2 = Project Manager)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mandatory fields are invalid
